literalstring.name: Diversification mitigates the risks of relying on a single technology's weaknesses, offering redundancy and protection against targeted attacks thereby reducing the likelihood of a "CAPEC-594: Traffic Injection" type attack.
literalstring.text: Diversification mitigates the risks of relying on a single technology's weaknesses, offering redundancy and protection against targeted attacks thereby reducing the likelihood of a "CAPEC-594: Traffic Injection" type attack.
